item.description:
Getting parents and kids together again to climb at Boston Rock Gym (BRG). Parents can belay for each other while the younger ones work out on the auto belays, the tread wall and the bouldering cave. BRG is popular with families on a Saturday night. We're scheduling this late enough to let the kids get back from soccer or whatever activity that is going on earlier. Please come join me and my son for some fun.

We may also grab a bite to eat afterwards at Tudo Na Brasa in Woburn (414 Main Street Woburn, MA).

See you soon, Douglas
item.name: Climbing with Kids (2/5/2011)
